description: Our scientists & professors are always researching & innovating and are always thinking about doing something that is new: PM India's space mission has made a mark across the world: PM The moment innovation stops, systems lose their life. Innovation is the need of the hour, for every society and eve…
caption: narendramodi.in
message:
At NISER spoke on innovation, research, scientific temper & why the name NISER augurs well for the institution. :) 

Called upon students to make NISER India's greenest campus, a zero-emission, zero-discharge campus which uses clean & renewable energy. http://nm-4.com/36of
